Plotting

Plotting module is based on (py)echarts.

Plotting._plotone — Method

OHLCV plot with bbands and alma indicators.

source
Plotting.countdf — Method

Bincount dataframe

source
Plotting.heatmap — Function

Heatmap of between two series.

source
Plotting.init_pyecharts — Function

Loads pyecharts python module.

source
Plotting.plotgrid — Function

Plots ohlcv data overlaying indicators inds and inds2.

source
Plotting.plotscatter3d — Method

Scatter plot only the end of a dataframe given from tail.

source
Plotting.@chart — Macro

Initializes pyechart chart class.

source
Plotting.@df_dates_data — Macro

Set dates and ohlc data from dataframe columns.

source
